item.title: CRH Stock Surges Nearly 7% Pre-Market On Ambitious 2030 Growth Target
item.description: CRH PLC's stock rose 6.76% to $128.00 in pre-market trading on Wednesday after the company unveiled its ambitious financial goals for 2030. read more

item.title: Elon Musk Says xAI Is Building 'Grokipedia' To Replace Wikipedia: 'Will Be A Massive Improvement'
item.description: Elon Musk announced his xAI startup is developing "Grokipedia" as a rival to Wikipedia, following fresh criticism from David Sacks. read more
